name: Border of Greed
description:
A pirate finds himself on a secret treasure island and believes that they are already in his pocket. He is so greedy that he prefers to do everything alone, without a team. But will the island submit to him?

A̶ ̶l̶o̶n̶g̶ ̶t̶i̶m̶e̶ ̶a̶g̶o̶.̶.̶  at any time of the day or night, a pirate was looking for adventures for himself. Regardless of others, but only to amuse his ego, he lived all his glorious days.

It is with a meeting with this hero that you will begin your journey.

Embark on an adventure through a mysterious treasure island, making your way through the wilds to find the main treasure and not lose your life.

Collect potions, explore all corners of the map, defeat bosses, upgrade skills in Border of Greed!
